title: The end of year celebrations with serenity thanks to Emprez
content:
The Emprez Team is getting ahead of Christmas to offer you a little gift that will be very useful to you:






Here is üéÅThe list of features üéÅ that will make it easier for you to manage your employees during the holiday season:








   Your payroll closes during the holidays or you took a few days off to enjoy your loved ones?
  

   Consider using the 
   Pay Anticipation feature to pay your employees on the future schedule, even if they haven't punched yet.
  

   For more information, see the article: 
   Pay anticipation.
  



Depending on how you manage your employees' time banks (illnesses, vacations, etc.), be aware that you can use the Add vacations in batch function instead of adding vacations to your employees file by file.

   For more information, see the article: 
   Adding Vacations in Batch.
   






    Whether your employees are on vacation or on schedule on Dec. 25th, 2024, and Jan. 1st, 2025, remember to notify these holidays in their files for updating time banks and/or calculating the premium. Thanks to the 
    Batch Add stat. Holidays tool, don't waste time doing it on a case-by-case basis.
   

    To find out more, see the article: 
    Adding one or more stat. holidays in batch.
   




    Do your teams or part of your teams work during the public holidays of December 25th, 2024, and/or January 1st, 2025?
   

    You can reward them with the 
    cumulative stat. holiday premium!
   

    For more information, see the article: 
    Cumulative premium - Stat. holidays
.
